data.Sentence_cn: 飞机正在逐渐把我逼疯。
data.Sentence: Aeroplanes are slowly driving me mad.

data.Sentence_cn: 我住在一个机场附近，过往飞机日夜不绝于耳。
data.Sentence: I live near an airport and passing planes can be heard night and day.

data.Sentence_cn: 机场是许多年前建的，但由于某种原因当时未能启用。
data.Sentence: The airport was built years ago, but for some reason it could not be used then.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而去年机场开始使用了。
data.Sentence: Last year, however, it came into use.

data.Sentence_cn: 有100多人肯定是被噪音逼得已经弃家远去，
data.Sentence: Over a hundred people must have been driven away from their homes by the noise.

data.Sentence_cn: 我是少数留下来的人中的一个。
data.Sentence: I am one of the few people left.

data.Sentence_cn: 有时我觉得这房子就要被一架飞过的飞机撞倒。
data.Sentence: Sometimes I think this house will be knocked down by a passing plane.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们曾向我提供一大笔钱让我搬走，但我决定留在这儿。
data.Sentence: I have been offered a large sum of money to go away, but I am determined to stay here.

data.Sentence_cn: 大家都说我肯定是疯了，也许他们说的是对的。
data.Sentence: Everybody says I must be mad and they are probably right.
